title: How to Make Turkish Delight Hot Milk

steps.headline: Chop the Turkish Delight into small cubes.
Put several cubes into the base of each cup.
Heat the milk in a heavy-based saucepan over low heat.
steps.description: Do not boil; only heat until warm.

steps.headline: Pour the warmed milk into each cup.
steps.description: Leave to stand momentarily, then stir in the melting Turkish Delight.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Once the Turkish Delight is evenly stirred in, the drink is ready for consumption.

text: Chop the Turkish Delight into small cubes.  Put several cubes into the base of each cup.  Heat the milk in a heavy-based saucepan over low heat. Do not boil; only heat until warm. Pour the warmed milk into each cup. Leave to stand momentarily, then stir in the melting Turkish Delight. Serve. Once the Turkish Delight is evenly stirred in, the drink is ready for consumption.
